text: EMS personnel may provide the following interventions to a patient who is wearing an intact comfort care bracelet or necklace that has not been defaced to comfort the patient or alleviate pain:
historical:

DC CODE ยง 7-651.08

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Clear the airway, excluding artificial ventilation, esophageal obturator airway, or advanced airway management;
Provide oxygen, excluding artificial ventilation, esophageal obturator airway, or advanced airway management;

title.text: Human Health Care and Safety. (Refs & Annos)

chapter.text: Non-Resuscitation Procedures for Emergency Medical Services.
